title: League is making me crash
body: I cant be in a game longer than 10 minutes without my computer screen going black and restarting. I updated all my drivers i have league compability in windows 7 and i have peer to peer transfer off.HELP{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It sounds like your PC may be experiencing hardware failure or just a *really poor driver interaction*. Before we have you run some hardware tests with our tech team, I'd like you to work through our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) to ensure the basics have been touched.

Let me know if those steps helped.
Thank you. That didnt work out for me but I went to my game settings and set my resolution lower and i set it to windowed. No more crash :) Thanks anyways
